data.name: Knockout City™ Trial
data.detailed_description:
Calling all brawlers: join us in Knockout City™ today for a free, level-capped trial*. Team up and duke it out with rivals across every map, with every ball, in every style, through every playlist. Throw, catch, pass, dodge and tackle your way to dodgeball dominance.

Customize your character and to start your Knockout City takeover. Knock out opponents with trick shots and coordinated teamwork while dodging and catching balls flying across the map. No ball? No problem! You can literally ball up, roll into a teammate’s hands and become the ultimate weapon.

A variety of outlandish ball types, locations and game modes keep it exciting. Plus, each season introduces new maps, ball types, rewards, events and challenges — but you’ll need to purchase the game to experience that!

data.short_description: Join us in Knockout City™ today for a free, level-capped trial*. Team up and duke it out with rivals across every map, with every ball, in every style, through every playlist. ™ during our limited-time Block Party event for a FREE trial*!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 6300 Dual Core 3.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or Dedicated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 Quad Core 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or Dedicated
